name: U.H.G. - Untitled Horde Game
description:
Join us on Discord!

This is a endless horde shooter with enemies that spawn more and get harder as the game goes on. You can upgrade your character as the game goes on and unbox epic weapons to fight the alien horde!

These controls will be added to the game someday lol

WASD - Movement

Mouse+Click to aim and shoot

E to open boxes and pick up weapons

1 and 2 to choose an upgrade when you complete a wave

F1 closes the game

R restarts the game

Esc pauses the game

This game is constantly updated and once it reaches a certain point will become a paid product.
